articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak
articles.title: Hugging Face unveils two new humanoid robots - TechCrunch
articles.description: Hugging Face hopes to start shipping two new open-source humanoid robots by the end of 2025.
articles.content:
AI dev platform Hugging Face continued its push into robotics on Thursday with the release of two new humanoid robots.
The company announced a pair of open source robots, HopeJR and Reachy Mini. Hop… [+1822 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Video apps like Hulu “cannot be used on Nintendo Switch 2,” says support page - Ars Technica
articles.description: Nintendo is still testing the 15,000+ game Switch library with the Switch 2.
